1721997314208.markdown: --- name: Duy-Phat (Ayden) Tran header: - text: tranduyphat01@gmail.com - text: phattd15 link: https://github.com/phattd15 - text: linkedin.com/in/phattd link: https://www.linkedin.com/in/phattd/ --- ## Education **University of Colorado Boulder** ~ M.S. in Computer Science ~ 10/2024 - 10/2026 **Toyo University** ~ B.S. in Computer Science ~ 04/2021 - 03/2025 ## Experience **Site Reliability Engineer Intern** ~ **Woven by Toyota** ~ 08/2024 - Present - Developed a system to monitor and alert teams about near-expiration HashiCorp Vault secrets, securing **80 services** and **500 credentials** leading to significant reduction in secret related incidents. - Streamlined Kubernetes resources deployment by building a CI/CD pipeline utilizing reusable Terraform modules, improving deployment efficiency and consistency across environments. - Handled discovery and resolution of **two SEV-3 production incidents**, performing root cause analysis, postmortem writeups, and implementing preventative actions. - **Technology**: Kubernetes, Terraform, Vault, PagerDuty, Python, AWS (Lambda, EventBridge, S3). **Software Engineer Intern** ~ **FPT Japan** ~ 06/2022 - 07/2024 - Building the in-house data platform SaaS product by launching multiple features through cross-functional collaborations, involved in **backend**, **frontend** and **infrastructure** development. - Co-owned 3 backend microservices using Microsoft Azure for job orchestration and API development, ensuring an SLO of **99.9% availability** with high coverage unit and integration tests. - Led the development of a product demo website by designing new website and backend microservices, contributes to sales efforts resulting in a **23% boost** in client conversion rates. - Implemented the entire feature that automating the process of generating data ingestion pipelines from multiple sources, supporting **1,800** fullscan and CDC extractions per month. - Provisioned Azure resources using Terraform, and set up CI/CD pipelines along with Kubernetes and Istio configurations for new backend microservices across multiple environments. - Authored software documentation, internal technical blogs, incident postmortem reports and an onboarding guide for new engineers that was used across 3 teams. - **Technology**: Kubernetes, Java, Spring, Python, FastAPI, Terraform, Istio, Vue.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Hibernate, Azure (AKS, DevOps, CosmosDB, Data Factory, Event Hubs, Datalake). **Software Engineer Intern** ~ **Mercari** ~ 07/2023 - 10/2023 - Launched a complex backend feature with extensive testing and migration scripts, resulting in a **3.4% increase** in monthly comments for the **20-million-user** eCommerce app. - Migrated a microservice's internal gRPC client build, resulting in monthly savings of **30TB** in storage, a reduction of **600 minutes** in CI build time saving to **9000$** of yearly infrastructure cost. - Implemented microservices monitoring, setting accurate SLOs, creating runbooks and playbooks to ensure system reliability and expedite incident resolution. - **Technology**: Kubernetes, gRPC, Go, Terraform, Datadog, MySQL, GCP (Spanner, GKE, Pub/Sub). **Software Engineer Intern** ~ **Google** ~ 02/2023 - 04/2023 - Engineered new features for Google Maps through Android and microservices API development, impacting **160 million users** and driven **14% new subscriptions** for the Local Guide program. - **Technology**: Kubernetes (Borg), gRPC, Java, C++, Android, Bazel, Spanner. **Software Engineer Intern** ~ **Thanh Phat SDC** ~ 11/2019 - 04/2022 - Core developer of project management software for 10+ partner companies' geological surveys. - Drove backend feature implementation, including schema design and API creation. - Managed cloud infrastructure, overseeing incidents resolution and system reliability. - **Technology**: Java, Spring, Terraform, AWS (Beanstalk, Lambda, DynamoDB, CloudWatch, S3). ## Certifications **CKAD: Certified Kubernetes Application Developer** ~ The Linux Foundation **Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer** ~ Google Cloud **HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate** ~ HashiCorp ## Skills **Programming Languages:** Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Kotlin, PHP **Tools and Frameworks:** Spring, gRPC, Vue, React, Docker, Kubernetes, Azure, GCP, AWS, Terraform **Languages:** English (Professional), Vietnamese (Native), Japanesse (Limited)
